page.title: 07MUTHILL SURVEY,ATTITUDES
page.content: 5 {Muthill - a good life ?} In our sample only{8}people had lived here less than a year,{42}between 1 and 10 years,{25}between 11 and 30 years and{20}for over 30 years. When asked "What do you like best about Muthill?" most people found that it was a fairly quiet, but very friendly community, in a good position both for rural activities and for travelling to larger centres (Edinburgh, Glasgow, Stirling). Its beautiful surroundings and countryside joys were often stressed.{Improvements }suggested were {1}Speed limit strictly enforced.{2} Repairs to pavements.{3}Return of village policeman.{4}More activities for younger people, especially tennis courts.{5}A lack of adequate bus transport is felt especially by the young and the elderly.
